(735x1+0)/1 mod 1024 = 735. (735x3+1)/2 mod 512 = 79. (735x9+5)/4 mod 256 = 119. (735x27+19)/8 mod 128 = 51. (735x81+65)/16 mod 64 = 13. (735x243+211)/32 mod 32 = 20. (735x243+211)/64 mod 16 = 10. (735x243+211)/128 mod 8 = 5. (735x729+761)/256 mod 4 = 0. (735x729+761)/512 mod 2 = 0. (735x729+761)/1024 mod 1 = 0.
